response.raw_message_text:
{
  "risk_factors": [
    ["Age", "high", "At 19, the person is at a higher risk for recidivism as younger individuals tend to have higher recidivism rates."],
    ["Race", "medium", "Identifying as Black can be correlated with systemic biases in the criminal justice system, though it is not a direct behavioral risk, it may factor into overall assessment."],
    ["Prior Arrest Record", "medium", "One previous arrest, despite no conviction, suggests a minor history of involvement with law enforcement which moderately raises risk."],
    ["Marital Status and Living Situation", "medium", "Living alone and never being married can indicate a lack of social support which may contribute to recidivism risks."],
    ["Education", "medium", "Holding only a high school diploma and not pursuing further education may limit economic opportunities, indirectly elevating risk."],
    ["Employment Status", "high", "Having held no jobs during the last year is a strong risk factor as unemployment is closely linked to higher recidivism rates."],
    ["Substance Use", "medium", "Recent use of marijuana adds a moderate risk factor due to its association with other risk behaviors, though not as severe as other substances."],
    ["Mental Health", "low", "Not experiencing depression over the past month suggests mental health is not currently a contributing risk factor."],
    ["Family and Upbringing", "low", "Living with a biological parent in a small household in a rural area may provide a stable upbringing, reducing risk."],
    ["Religious Belief", "low", "Belief that God influences personal events can serve as a protective factor by promoting personal responsibility and community support."]
  ],
  "prediction": "YES",
  "confidence": 70
}

risk_factors: At 19, the person is at a higher risk for recidivism as younger individuals tend to have higher recidivism rates.
Identifying as Black can be correlated with systemic biases in the criminal justice system, though it is not a direct behavioral risk, it may factor into overall assessment.
One previous arrest, despite no conviction, suggests a minor history of involvement with law enforcement which moderately raises risk.
Living alone and never being married can indicate a lack of social support which may contribute to recidivism risks.
Holding only a high school diploma and not pursuing further education may limit economic opportunities, indirectly elevating risk.
Having held no jobs during the last year is a strong risk factor as unemployment is closely linked to higher recidivism rates.
Recent use of marijuana adds a moderate risk factor due to its association with other risk behaviors, though not as severe as other substances.
Not experiencing depression over the past month suggests mental health is not currently a contributing risk factor.
Living with a biological parent in a small household in a rural area may provide a stable upbringing, reducing risk.
Belief that God influences personal events can serve as a protective factor by promoting personal responsibility and community support.

prompt.system:
You are a highly experienced criminal justice risk assessment expert
employing advanced statistical and judicial knowledge.
prompt.user:
You are a criminal risk assessment expert. Step back, take a deep breath and carefully think step by step to assign a relative weight [low, medium, high] to each risk factor before using them to collectively predict 3-year rearrest recidivism:
The person is a 19-year-old male who identifies himself as Black. He has been arrested 1 time but has not been convicted. He is 5 feet 4 inches and weighs between 125 and 149 lbs. He has never been married and is currently living alone. He has a high school diploma and is not enrolled in college. He has held no jobs during the year. He has used drugs in the past four years (marijuana) and has not felt depressed over the past month. At a young age, he lived with his biological mother in a household of size 3, in a rural area. He considers that God has something to do with what happens to him personally.

After your analysis, you must respond ONLY with a JSON object in exactly this format, with no additional text:

{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("factor1", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ("factor2", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ...
  ],
  "prediction": "YES" or "NO",
  "confidence": number between 0 and 100
}
